original_title: Simon Munnery: Alan Parker - Urban Warrior - The Farewell Tour
overview: Multi award-winning comedian Simon Munnery reprises his notorious alter ego, the bedsit anarchist Alan Parker Urban Warrior. Once the most radical, now the only radical, Alan returns with the old gold, the old truths, and some new truths (based on the old truths).
title: Simon Munnery: Alan Parker - Urban Warrior - The Farewell Tour
